```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
df <- read_csv("~/Downloads/idhs_00002.csv.gz")
```

## number of rows and columns 

```{r}
nrow(df)

ncol(df)
```

## Visualize 

First, we want to make a histogram of age 

```{r}
df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = AGE)) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, color = "black", fill = "grey") + 
  cowplot::theme_cowplot()
```

```{r}
## step 1 
deal_kid_by_age <- df %>% 
  filter(IDEALKID < 50) %>% 
  group_by(AGE) %>% 
  summarize(ideal_children_avg = mean(IDEALKID))

## step 2 
deal_kid_by_age %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = AGE, y = ideal_children_avg)) + 
  geom_point(size = 2) + 
  geom_line(size = 1) + 
  cowplot::theme_cowplot() + 
  labs(x = "Age", y = "Ideal Children") 
  
  
  
## basic scatterplot 
df %>% 
  filter(IDEALKID < 50) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = AGE, y = IDEALKID)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth() + 
  cowplot::theme_cowplot()
```
